alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 10:08AM MST until January 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 4 and 8 inches, with local amounts to 12 inches near the mountains. * WHERE...Eastport, Sandpoint, Colville, Northport, Bonners Ferry, Orin-Rice Road, Athol, Newport, Flowery Trail Road, Chewelah, Deer Park, Springdale-Hunters Road, Kettle Falls, Schweitzer Mountain Road, and Priest River. * WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
